name: server-side-slinger
description: This is a sample template for sam-app - Below is a brief explanation of what we have generated for you:

scripts.start-local:
rm -rf ./.aws-sam/build && (sam local start-lambda &) && TABLE_NAME=JesseTest DISABLE_WIDGET_CACHE=true LOCAL_LAMBDA=true sam local start-api 2>&1 | tr "" "
"
scripts.start-local-fast: rm -rf ./.aws-sam/build && (sam local start-lambda &) && TABLE_NAME=JesseTest DISABLE_WIDGET_CACHE=false LOCAL_LAMBDA=true sam local start-api
scripts.kill-local: kill $(ps aux | grep 'sam local' | awk '!/grep/' | awk '{print $2}')
scripts.tdd: cd src && npm run tdd && cd ../
scripts.test: cd src && npm install && npm test && cd ../
scripts.integration-test: cd src && npm run integration-test && cd ../
scripts.deploy-code: npm t && npm run integration-test && npm run sam-validate && npm run sam-build && npm run sam-deploy
